name: [CR]PostWarning
author: Arief Bayu Purwanto

sections.description:
Have you ever been in situation where you publish post. But displayed in wrong location due to forgot setting the right tags / categories.
Or, broken blog layout because of forgot to setting featured images.

Don’t worry, this plugin will help you remember that. You could also set custom warning messages to your like.
sections.installation:
1. Upload crpostwarning directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings Â» [CR]Post Warning and set your warning messages
sections.faq:
What is the minimum PHP requirement?

For the plugin itself, PHP4 and JAVASCRIPT activated. Right, you need javascript to be able to use this plugin.

short_description: help you avoid a situation where you publish post but forgot to set title / tags / categories / faetured images / etc.
